coursePolicies.title: Course Policies
coursePolicies.subTitle: See the policies of what this tutor defined for refunds and cancellations

cancelBeforeStarting.name: Cancel the course before it starts
cancelBeforeStarting.condition: Only cancel course before the {{condition}} session starts

cancelInProgress.name: Cancel the course while it's in progress
cancelInProgress.condition: Only cancel course before the {{condition}} session starts

cancelSessionBeforeStarting.name: Cancel the session before the course starts
cancelSessionBeforeStarting.condition: Only cancel session after {{condition}} session starts

cancelSessionInProgress.name: Cancel the session while the course is in progress
cancelSessionInProgress.condition: Only cancel session after {{condition}} session starts
